thread.title: Russia Set to Retaliate Against U.S. With More Sanctions

author: Thomas Grove
title: Russia Set to Retaliate Against U.S. With More Sanctions
text:
Britain’s top diplomat on Friday accused Russian President Vladimir Putin of ordering a nerve-agent attack that left an ex-double agent fighting for his life, as police launched a murder investigation into the death of another Russian exile in the U.K.
Police said an autopsy showed businessman Nikolai Glushkov, a 68-year-old former top executive of Russian state airline Aeroflot and Kremlin critic, was found dead from “compression to the neck” at his home March 12, about a week after the poisoning of an ex-spy and his daughter...
